TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SrgsGrammarCompiler extends System.Object
public ref class SrgsGrammarCompiler abstract sealed

summary.span: Compiles and XML-format grammar files into binary grammar files with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

span.span: Compiles and XML-format grammar files into binary grammar files with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si esegue la compilazione oggetti e le grammatiche XML in formato a un formato binario per ottimizzarle per il caricamento e l'utilizzo dal motore di riconoscimento vocale.You compile objects and XML-format grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. La compilazione di una grammatica di riconoscimento vocale utilizzando uno del metodi possono ridurre la quantit√† di tempo necessario per costruire un dell'oggetto da un o una grammatica XML in formato.Compiling a speech recognition grammar using one of the methods can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an or an XML-format grammar. Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [compilare le grammatiche SRGS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).

summary.span: Compiles objects and XML-format grammar files into binary grammar files with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

summary.span: Compiles an XML-format grammar file into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

span.span: Compiles an XML-format grammar file into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il file di grammatica XML in formato deve essere conforme al [vocale riconoscimento grammatica specifica (SRGS) versione 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).The XML-format grammar file must conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/). Quando si accede ai file, viene eseguito un controllo di sicurezza quando il file viene creato o aperto.When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened. Il controllo della sicurezza in genere non viene eseguito nuovamente, a meno che il file viene chiuso e riaperto.The security check is typically not done again unless the file is closed and reopened. Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [compilare le grammatiche SRGS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).

is .
is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il file di grammatica di formato XML a cui fa riferimento il deve essere conforme al [vocale riconoscimento grammatica specifica (SRGS) versione 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).The XML-format grammar file referenced by the must conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/). Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [compilare le grammatiche SRGS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).
